alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 4:10PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central San Diego County through 445 PM PDT... At 410 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hwy S2 Between Canebrake And Imperial County Line, or 11 miles east of Mount Laguna, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hwy S2 Between Canebrake And Imperial County Line, Hwy S2 Vallecito Creek Rd, Hwy S2 Between Agua Caliente And Canebrake, and Canebrake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Mountains
